(Authors Note: Im going to assume that all the characters are anthropomorphic)

"Hm? Who could it be this time?" Riolu makes his way back to the door again and opens it up to see his girlfriend, Umbreon.

Umbreon was even a few inches taller than Riolu. One thing that Riolu really hated though, was how much smarter she was than him.          "Oh uhm. Hey Umby! What brings you here?" Riolu asked. "Oh yknow, I just thought I'd stop by and say hi to my boyfriend. Can I come in?" Umbreon replied. "Yes of course" Riolu saud, stepping out of the way. Umbreon stepped in, looking around before back to Riolu. "So. Are you gonna show me what you got in your hand there or are we just gonna assume I never saw it?" Umbreon asked, bending over to be at eye level with him. "What? Oh, this thing." Aren't you a little old to be playing with toy gu--" Umbreon was cut off by a large flash of light that originated from the gun. A bright beam of light shoots from the gun.
